name: patientAppointment/bookAppointment
description: This API call is used to request appointment in iDoc.

parameters.name: patientId
parameters.description: If user is not patient, then this value is required.

parameters.name: AppointmentReason
parameters.description: Use '/getProcedureList' to retrieve Appointment reason id.

parameters.name: AppointmentInformation
parameters.description: Additional Notes or Other Reason for Appointment
